title:
Bidiagonal matrix factorisations related to multiple orthogonal
  polynomials
authors:
Am\'ilcar Branquinho, Juan E.F. D\'iaz, Ana Foulqui\'e-Moreno,
  H\'elder Lima, and Manuel Ma\~nas
abstract:
In this work, we develop two methods to obtain a factorisation as a product
of bidiagonal matrices for the Hessenberg recurrence matrix of a system of
multiple orthogonal polynomials. One method is based on the Gauss-Borel
factorisation of the moment matrix of the system and of its Darboux
transformations, and the other uses the connection of multiple orthogonal
polynomials with production matrices and branched continued fractions. As a
case study, we present an explicit bidiagonal factorisation for the Hessenberg
recurrence matrix of the Jacobi-Pi\~neiro polynomials, using both methods, and
of the multiple Laguerre polynomials of first kind, as a limiting case.
